name: A. Pangram
statement:
A word or a sentence in some language is called a if all the characters
of the alphabet of this language appear in it . Pangrams are often used
to demonstrate fonts in printing or test the output devices.You are
given a string consisting of lowercase and uppercase Latin letters.
Check whether this string is a pangram. We say that the string contains
a letter of the Latin alphabet if this letter occurs in the string in
uppercase or lowercase.
